# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, " ")
    lines = []
    line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end

    push!(lines, line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
wrap_string("This is a long string with multiple words that need to be wrapped at a maximum width of 10 characters.")
```

Output:

```
"This is a long string\nwith multiple words\nthat need to be wrapped\nat a maximum width of 10 characters."
```
